alert.note: Alert for Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 8:59PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Niobrara and northeastern Goshen Counties through 945 PM MDT... At 859 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rawhide Buttes, or 12 miles south of Lusk, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Prairie Center, Rawhide Buttes, Jay Em and Van Tassell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Cheyenne.
